attributes.action: A361 TIVERTON IMPROVE SAFETY PREVENT FATALITIES
attributes.additional_details: Implement a road safety plan, with common road safety measures to prevent collisions due to issues related to the above. Roll out schemes such as the VISION ZERO 2040 STRATEGY.
attributes.background:
Opening in 1989 the stretch of road has been ranked the 10th most dangerous in the UK claiming the lives of many
There are the following issues
No central reservation
No HGV warning
No speed camera
No tourist attraction sign 
No bend warning
No overhead lighting
Overtaking allowed

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local roads are a matter for your local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
